--- Firedrill ---

Firedrill looks at the two for a second, then replies, "If it's 
alright with you, i wouldn't mind getting more presentable." He nods 
to to Melchana and Bethassan.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Melchana: Alright, here we go.
> 
> She looked at him.
> 
> Melchana: You look pretty damaged... Maybe you should repair your 
> metal hide into the renewal chamber once we arrive.
> 
> Belthassan: Belthassan to Hellgate. Melchana, do you read?
> 
> Melchana: Yeah, I got you, brother.
> 
> Belthassan: Good. Once you reach the ship, come to the storage 
room as 
> soon as you can.
> 
> Melchana: Wait a second Bel. Firedrill seems in bad shape. If he 
wants 
> to, I'll get him to Renewal Chamber first.
> 
> Belthassan: This... kindness... is so unlike you, Mel... Alright 
> then... Firedrill, it is up to you. Do you think you can handle 
some 
> tasks before renewal, or do you wish to go there now?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "-rAuq-" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > --- Firedrill ---
> > 
> > Firedrill nods and sits down, thinking about the adventure he 
was 
> > going on.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > Melchana had an evil looking grin pass on her face.
> > > 
> > > Melchana: So, you do have a short memory... You're the Autobot 
> > > Ambassador. You'll be living as a Tripredacus for some times 
just 
> > like 
> > > Gesper is living as an Autobot. For now, we're going to 
Australia. 
> > > That's where we established the Shadow Destiny.
> > > 
> > > She started the engines and flew off.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "-rAuq-" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > > ooC: I'll cover Firedrill for a bit, but not for long, just 
long 
> > > > enough to bring him out of the picture. =)
> > > > 
> > > > -- Firedrill --
> > > > 
> > > > Firedrill nods, and steps onto the ship, "Sorry, Melchana, 
just 
> > > > thinking..." He pauses, shakes his head, and continues, "So, 
> > where 
> > > > were we headed again?"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > > > OOC: Hey, who has control of Firedrill since Jer left?
> > > > > 
> > > > > BIC: Melchana was getting more and more impatient...
> > > > > 
> > > > > Melchana: What is this idiot waiting for to get aboard?
